command.namer.nick.set.fail.unknown: Unknown error occurred while setting your nickname
command.namer.nick.set.fail.length: Nickname "%s" is longer that max nickname length (%s)
command.namer.nick.no.permission: You do not have permission to set your own nickname
command.namer.allow_setting_own_nickname: Players can now set their own nicknames
Only operators can set nicknames now
text.config.namer.title: Namer Configuration
text.config.namer.option.maxNickLength.t: The maximum length of a nickname. Set to 0 for no limit.
text.config.namer.option.allowNickFormat: If enabled, players can use placeholder api formatting in their nicknames
text.config.namer.option.allowSettingOwn: If enabled, all players can set their own nicknames. If disabled, only operators can set nicknames.
